events.name: twoHearts
events.details: On a sunny summer day, visit the beach when Alex is there.

events.name: fiveHearts
events.details: Enter Alex's house when he's there.

events.name: sixHearts
events.details: Enter Alex's house when he's there.

events.name: eightHearts
events.details: On a sunny summer day, visit the beach when Alex is there. Note: Cannot be triggered after marrying Alex, since he no longer visits the beach.

events.name: tenHearts
events.details: Alex will send you a letter to meet him at the Saloon after dark. After receiving the letter, enter the Saloon between 7pm and 10pm.

events.name: fourteenHearts
events.details: Exit the Farmhouse in year 2+ between 5am and 8:20am on any day other than Sunday. You must have 5,000g available.
